history.proof: intros n m p H1 H2. strivial use: Z.mul_le_mono_neg_l.

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
apply Zmult_le_compat_l_rev with (p := p) in H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m p : Z, p > 0 -> n * p <= m * p -> n <= m" on hypothesis of type "n <= m".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
apply Zmult_le_compat_l_rev with (p := p) in H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m p : Z, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p" on hypothesis of type "n <= m".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
apply Zmult_le_compat_l_rev with (p := p) in H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m p : Z, 0 < p -> n <= m -> n * p <= m * p" on hypothesis of type "p < 0".

original: intros n m p H1 H2. apply Zmult_le_compat_l_rev with (p := p) in H2. apply Zmult_le_reg_r in H2. auto. apply Z.lt_le_trans with (n*p) (m*p) (m) in H2. auto. apply Zmult_lt_0_le_compat_r in H1. auto.
